byline.contributor: Salman Masood contributed reporting from Islamabad, Pakistan.

abstract: At least 22 people are killed and over 40 injured in suicide bombing of regional branch of Pakistan's National Database and Registration Authority in Mardan.
lead_paragraph: The assault at the Mardan branch of the National Database and Registration Authority killed at least 22 people and wounded more than 40.

headline.main: Suicide Attack Targets Regional Government Office in Pakistan

snippet: The assault at the Mardan branch of the National Database and Registration Authority killed at least 22 people and wounded more than 40.
